Record your screen and webcam and instantly share with anyone! PixelMixer is the easiest way to capture critical information when there's no time to organize a meeting or explain yourself twice.

Maximize productivity, share knowledge, and scale your outreach using the power of video. 

After installing the extension, you can record your screen, webcam, mic or any combination, and share with others using a secure link. Viewers can post comments, like and visualize the relevant topics. Automatic transcription, topic detection and video storage are all included for free :)

Sign in using Gmail or your existing PixelMixer login id.

What are you waiting for? Try it out and experience the joy of PixelMixer today!
